name: Winning 888 Standard Edition
description:
Winning 888 Standard Edition is a fun dice game that is complementary to Ultimate Mafia - Real World Land Wars, and allows the player to earn chips daily which can then be converted into Reward Points.

STATISTICALLY IN YOUR FAVOR, this game will reward you with chips convertible to Reward Points over the long run! Your strategy will help determine how much of an edge you will have on the house. It is possible to achieve anywhere from 25% advantage to 200% advantage over the house (triple your chips!).

Fun, easy to learn, and quick to master. Download it now and start gaining an edge in the game!

************************************

This is the Standard Edition with the following features:
Double the simultaneous bets to 4 bets, and outcome displays to 4 displays. You will also quadruple your daily chip withdrawal limit to 40 chips, upgrade your daily free chips to 40 chips, and increase your daily bets to 40 bets.

For players who want to bring down the house and really get ahead in Ultimate Mafia, upgrade to the Ultimate Edition for:
All 11 Simultaneous bets and all 11 outcome displays are available. Daily chip withdrawal limit of up to 100 chips per day, and ten times the number of free daily chips and daily bets, to 100 chips and 100 bets respectively.
